r.s: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework
r.d: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework. Event-driven Full asynchronous non-blocking Multi-Thread or Multi-Process Millisecond timer Asynchronous MySQL AsyncTask workers
r.n: - Enabled by default async_mysql - Add tcp heartbeat mechanism - UDP send no require from_id - swoole_client on::Receive and on::Close no need to call recv/close - Add last_time and connect_time to tcp connection_info - rebuild data_buffer
